[Root.GetBestName] has recently asked [Root.GetHerHis] Chinese strategist to train a specific commander.

However, Chinese strategists have an unusual amount of autonomy, due to their ties with their homeland, and they begrudge this kind of direct interference with their duties. [Root.GetBestName] will have to wait a while before making another such request.

§g(This modifier was added by a targeted decision included in the §MED-CT§g mod. The duration is reduced by having multiple strategists, and by having a Golden Age strategist.)§!
Does NOT already have two §YChinese leadership traits§!

[Root.GetBestName] has recently asked [Root.GetHerHis] Marshal to train a specific commander.

However, Marshals can only perform a limited amount of additional training over and above their regular duties, so [Root.GetBestName] will have to wait a while before making another such request.

§g(This modifier was added by a targeted decision included in the §MED-CT§g mod. The duration is reduced if the Marshal who provided the training had higher martial skill.)§!
Does NOT owe a favor to [This.GetHerHis] §YMarshal§!
An event occurs, allowing you to view the details of the training and the cost.\n\nNB: You may choose to cancel the training for no cost.
§RWARNING! Duration is longer than §Y5 years§R, due to the Marshal's low martial skill!
